request.description:
This GraphQL API illustrates, with a single request, the ability to combine 2 subgraphs into a single Federated graphQL API using Tyk

**Subgraph URLs:**

*   [http://localhost:4001/query](http://localhost:4001/query)
*   [http://localhost:4002/query](http://localhost:4002/query)
    

**Query to send to supergraph:**

``` graphql
query{
  user(id: 1){
    id
    name
    posts{
      id
      title
    }
}

```

Checkout the federation deployment README for steps to adding a 3rd subgraph
